divs: Sighting DetailsIs it possible to be the only one outta of like 5 people to see this thing hidden as a star then come racing over the mountain top of Tussy mountains.Its hard to explain how the light "echo'd" of the trees and never really reflected off of them..
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Altoona
There were no other sightings in Altoona on or around July 27th 2004
Summary: I thought it was the North Star and my friend goes "Mikey what are you looking at"
